info.title: Customer Database
info.description: This is the customer database sample Swagger document included with IBM Integration Bus

tags.name: customers
tags.description: Operations on customers in the customer database

get.summary: Get all customers from the database

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of customers to get from the database

200.description: An array of customers from the database

post.summary: Add a customer to the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The customer to add to the database

200.description: If the customer was successfully added to the database

get.summary: Get a specified customer from the database

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to get from the database

200.description: The specified customer from the database

delete.summary: Delete a specified customer from the database

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to delete from the database

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Provide the authorization key that permits the customer to be deleted from the database

200.description: If the customer was successfully deleted from the database

put.summary: Update a customer in the database

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to update in the database

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The customer to update in the database

200.description: If the customer was successfully updated in the database
